mouseReleased(MouseEvent) - Method in class XOBoard
First checks if the game is over or not if its not then it loops to find the source of the event by using EventObject.getSource() method and then sets the text of the button to X or O according to the turn and disables the button by using AbstractButton.setEnabled(boolean) and adds one to the XOBoard.NOfMoves.
